metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010127 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: VCFTools vcftools prior to version 0.1.15 is affected by: Use-after-free. The impact is: Denial of Service or possibly other impact (eg. code execution or information disclosure). The component is: The header::add_FILTER_descriptor method in header.cpp. The attack vector is: The victim must open a specially crafted VCF file. It was discovered that VCFtools improperly handled memory allocation/deallocation, resulting in a use-after-free vulnerability. If a victim were tricked into opening a specially crafted VCF File, an attacker could cause VCFtools to leak sensitive information or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: vcftools package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.1.16-1').
